attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: could you please consider some way of slowing down the A13.Every week there is an accident or a major traffic jam I sat in traffic for four hours just after christmas due to a fatal accident, is this humane (no loo/plus body cramp) someone sitting in a stationary car for four hours. The police need to look at French roads and the way they deal with accidents keeping the traffic moving.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
